import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, VStack, HStack, Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionButton, AccordionIcon, AccordionPanel } from "@chakra-ui/react" /***************************************************************/ import { Button } from "../style_components/button" import { Text } from "../style_components/text" import { ManaSymbol } from "./mana_symbol" import { symbols } from "../ressources/symbols" /***************************************************************/ export function ManaCost(props) { const setManaCostFunction = props.setManaCost const manaCost = props.manaCost const setColorlessManaAmount = props.setColorlessManaAmount const colorlessManaAmount = props.colorlessManaAmount function resetValues() { setManaCostFunction([]) setColorlessManaAmount(0) } return ( Mana cost : setColorlessManaAmount(colorlessManaAmount + 1)}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.Blue))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.Black))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.Red))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.Green))}>

setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.HybridGB))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> setManaCostFunction(manaCost.concat(symbols.White))}> ); }
